attributes.action: Deport 'Kev' off TEF for his outbust
attributes.additional_details: In the early afternoon of Friday 15th of November, the forum member known as 'Kev' made a misinformed and heartbreaking outburst against his fellow member and Evertonian brethren 'The_Hustler'. Resorting to a tirade of gut-wrenching, horrific abuse. I call on the relevant minister to ensure this never happens again by removing 'Kev' from the country for ever. Send him to Israel.
